narrative.iWantTo: I test Tutorials EventSearch Page of Ticket Master Developer's site

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/tutorials/events-search/) Verification for general page's elements
scenario.step: Then check general page elements for Tutorials EventSearch Page, where DISQUS = false and LeftMenu = true

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/tutorials/events-search/) Verification for all the page's links

examples.step: Given open Tutorials EventSearch page
When check visibility and click <elementKey> element of Tutorials EventSearch page
Then check that new page opened from Tutorials EventSearch page has <pageURL> and <pageTitle>
